$apikey = 'xxx';
    $apisecret = 'xxx';
    $nonce = time();
    $uri = 'https://bittrex.com/api/v1.1/market/getopenorders?apikey=' .
        $apikey . '&nonce=' . $nonce;
    $sign = hash_hmac('sha512', $uri, $apisecret);
    $ch = curl_init($uri);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, array('apisign:' . $sign));
    $execResult = curl_exec($ch);
    $obj = json_decode($execResult);
